scripts.generate: cd grammar && java -jar ../antlr-4.13.2-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript -visitor -Xexact-output-dir -o ../src/parser RalphLexer.g4 && java -jar ../antlr-4.13.2-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript -visitor -Xexact-output-dir -lib ../src/parser -o ../src/parser RalphParser.g4 && cd ..
